comments:
Build ID: I20070503-1400

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run any report from API




More information:
I'm trying to get to the point where I can run reports containing crosstabs from the API.

birt-runtime-2.2.0-N20070510.zip - With this one, I can execute reports from the API, but not anything with crosstabs.

birt-runtime-2.2.0-N20070515.zip - With this one, I can't run anything.  Even the most simple reports with no elements.  Another thing I noticed is that the ChartEngine directory is now missing from this build.  I don't know if that's intentional or not.  So I downloaded birt-charts-2.2.0-N20070515.zip, but the zip file is corrupt (I downloaded twice).

FWIW, the reports I'm trying to run were created with the designer from birt-report-designer-all-in-one-2.2.0-N20070510.zip.

------------------------------------
May 15, 2007 5:26:27 PM org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask doRun
SEVERE: Error happened while running the report.

this bug is duplicated with:
bug 186739: Can't generate html and pdf report using report engine[0600]
bug 187463: NoClassDefFoundError will be thrown when run report with BIRT-Runtime

we have fixed these 2 bugs and all are fine since BIRT.v20070518.

Thanks.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 187463 ***
